author: jerenkrantz
msg: Even if we do not check the value of APR_IPV6_V6ONLY before setting, we still
must set the option cache if we're setting APR_IPV6_V6ONLY.  Otherwise,
This fixes Listen directives on IPv6 machines where IPV6_V6ONLY may be
enabled (i.e. FreeBSD 5.x, OpenBSD, NetBSD) where it would not properly

author: jorton
msg: * include/apr_file_io.h: Add APR_LARGEFILE flag, with warning.

author: jorton
msg: * test/testlfs.c (test_open): Skip rather than fail if apr_file_trunc
gives EINVAL when passed the 8gb offset.

author: bnicholes
msg: Remove the stat caching from the default NetWare build
